card

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • card.Card
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CardVisitor
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreditCard, VlibreCard, VmaxCard

    public abstract class Card
extends java.lang.Object
implements CardVisitor
    This abstract class is the basis to create user cards. Each Card has a unique id (regardless of the type of the card) and a timeCredit.
    Author:
    Pietro Dellino
    See Also:
    CardIdGenerator, VlibreCard, VmaxCard

      • addCredit

        public void addCredit(int newCredit)
        This method adds credit to the card and updates the total time-credit earned by a user
        Parameters:
        newCredit - the credit to add to the previous timeCredit

      • useCredit

        public void useCredit(int credit)
               throws InsufficientCreditException
        If the timeCredit is high enough, it removes credit from it. If not, it raises a InsufficientCreditException.
        Parameters:
        credit - the credit to use.
        Throws:
        InsufficientCreditException
